about:
Hi, Im Neil.


 Born in California, I moved to Bangalore, India when I was 3 and have lived here ever since. I completed my bachelors in technology in 2023 and am currently working as a computer vision analyst at Eli Lilly Co. 

 Alongside my work in computer vision, I also work in the generative AI space on multiple projects. I love learning new technologies and broadening the way I can use them in my work. I treat every new project is an oppurtunity to learn.
